title: Thirudiya Idhayathai Song Lyrics Paarvai Ondre Podhume
stanzas:
Thirudiya Idhayathai Song Lyrics Paarvai Ondre Podhume
#Bharani

sirikkira sirippai niruthividu,
paarkkira paarvaiyai marandhuvidu,
paesia paechai niruthividu,
pennae, ennai marandhuvidu,
uyirae, marandhuvidu,
uravae marandhuvidu,
anbae vilagividu,
ennai vaazha vidu,

kaatraai maari kaadhalikkiraen
kannae oru murai swaasam kol
naanum unnai samandhikkiraen
endrae indoru vaarthai sol
mannavannae, mannavannae
uyiril uyiraai kalandhavanae

idhayathodu idhayam saerthu,
oru murai aavadhu poottikol,
kangalodu kangal vaithu,
oru murai aavadhu paarthukol,
